name: 2 Minutes 16 Seconds (2分16秒)
description:
This is a 2D Pixel Top-Down Space Shooter Game.
The game implemented Rogue-Lite elements, like the survivor series.

"Captain, every 2 minutes and 16 seconds, the Alien Mothership catch up with us using Spatial Jump. Luckily, we analyzed their technology so that we can also perform Jumps to escape from them. However, it's necessary for us to collect fuels in the space, in order to move and jump. We could also rescue lost people and ships, and add them to our fleet. With our advanced Initializer, we can Initialize ships' weapon system and invite them into our battleship fleet; we can also Initialize people's Implanted learning devices to let them join as crew members. But PLEASE remember, Initialization cost TIME, and jump during Initialization would abandon what's being Initialized.

Control: WASD/Arrow + Enter/Mouse"

Hope you enjoy this game!
